objective: To provide insurance coverage to farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities
benefits: Insurance coverage against crop loss due to natural calamities
Financial assistance to farmers in case of crop loss
Subsidy to farmers for crop insurance premium
eligibility: Farmers who have land holdings of 2 hectares or less
Farmers who have taken a loan from a bank or other financial institution
Farmers who have not taken a loan from a bank or other financial institution
how_to_apply: Farmers can apply for crop insurance through their bank or other financial institution
Farmers can also apply online through the National Crop Insurance Portal
Farmers can contact their local agricultural extension officer for more information
important_dates_or_frequency: Crop insurance premium is due on 15th June every year
